Glass Animals

pulling down backstreets deep in your head

slippin thru dreamland like a tourist

pulling down backstreets deep in your head

slippin thru dreamland like a tourist

that first friend you had

that worst thing you said

that perfect moment

that last tear you shed

Dreamland by Glass Animals
